definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: A limitation of the analysis was that population-specific effects were not considered.
sentences.chinese: 这项分析的限制是并未考虑到族群特定的效应。

sentences.english: The Arevaci are a warlike people.
sentences.chinese: 阿雷瓦西人是好战的族群。

sentences.english: Ethnic groups in Hezhou interact each other frequently and complexly.
sentences.chinese: 贺州族群间的互动是频繁而又复杂多样的。

sentences.english: This research was to study the perceived value and customer value of the mature-aged Hot-Spring.
sentences.chinese: 探讨熟龄族群消费者在温泉区之知觉价值。

sentences.english: All of these groups continue to have above-average birth rates.
sentences.chinese: 所有这些族群出生率将继续维持在平均以上。

sentences.english: Effects of different numerical techniques on phenetic classification of Mosla complex (Labiatae) at population level.
sentences.chinese: 不同表示方法对齐宁族群外表型分类之影响。

sentences.english: This dissertation is an anthropological comparative study of the Zhuang and Han nationality"s bone-collecting rebury."
sentences.chinese: 本文是对广东壮汉族群捡骨重葬俗的研究。

sentences.english: Romanies in Europe, like any other ethnic group, are no monolith.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲的吉普赛人与其他族群一样也分三六九等。

sentences.english: In the reforms of the course, consider the unique ethnical characteristics of all the students fully.
sentences.chinese: 在课程的改革中，充分考虑所有学生独特的族群特征。

sentences.english: For that reason he refuses to say which clan he hails from.
sentences.chinese: 也正是因为这样，他不愿意说起自己来自哪个族群。

sentences.english: Most Hakka groups of Kaohsiung County live inMeinong.
sentences.chinese: 高雄县的客家族群主要住在美浓。

sentences.english: Your also anti-discriminate and tribal grouping tribal group opposition?
sentences.chinese: 你也反对种族歧视及族群对立吗？

sentences.english: Buddhism believed by Turki is mainly introduced from China mainland.
sentences.chinese: 突厥语族群所信仰的佛教主要是由内地传入的。

sentences.english: Their immigration pattern isn’t identical to that of other groups.
sentences.chinese: 他们的移民规律与其他族群也不尽相同。

sentences.english: The basic spirit of revering the nature had formed.
sentences.chinese: 在庞大族群的长征中，形成了敬畏自然的基本精神。

sentences.english: It will lead to bulimia later destabilizing relations in a group.
sentences.chinese: 这样会导致暴食症影响将来它们将来在族群中的关系。

definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
population (of a species)/community (of animals or plants)
to multiply/to reproduce/to increase gradually in number or quantity
